subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jim Isch, the N.C.A.A.’s interim president, will make the decision on the N.C.A.A. tournament’s TV contract, greatly influencing whether the tournament expands.
snippet: Jim Isch, the N.C.A.A.’s interim president, will make the decision on the N.C.A.A. tournament’s TV contract, greatly influencing whether the tournament expands.
